attributes.action: Government promotion for more nurses and health care assistants
attributes.additional_details: Due to stringent time scales and deadlines having to be recorded, less time is being given to front line care
attributes.background: Wards are becoming seriously under threat due to lack of nurses and health care assistants, jobs are there, but not being filled.

rejection.details:
It is not clear what action you want the UK Government to take and what is meant be "promotion" is this context. 

Depending on your intentions you could start a petition:
Asking the government to run a campaign to promote nursing and other healthcare careers. 
Asking the government to review the nursing staffing levels and develop a plan to meet any shortfall. 
Asking the government to review the salaries and/or terms and conditions for these roles to make them more attractive.
